entry.title: The Guardian
entry.summary:
Author: our_sin

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,581Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Stiles has been in college since he was fifteen, and in that time he amassed over twenty different degrees but never once put them to use. Eventually one professor decided enough was enough forcing Stiles to do the unthinkable and go find a job.Instead a job finds him. A scary, weird, awesome job that forces him to go on a quest to save the world within two days.Oh and he may or may not meet the man of his dreams along the way.

entry.title: Who’s That Hot Guy And Why Is He Smiling at Me Like That?
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 459Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 44

Summary: Stiles wakes up groggy and confused after surgery with a mild case of temporary amnesia. The nurse tells him his husband is waiting for him, and when said husband walks in, Stiles can't stop blushing and shamelessly flirting with the incredibly hot stranger. Derek plays along, amused and quietly touched until Stiles finally remembers… and realizes he’s been thirsting hard over his own husband.

entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,960Chapters: 7/60Kudos: 23

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)With the recent revelation of a long-lost Hale ancestor on another world and a Druid conspiracy against the Littlefields, Derek and Cora must confront their family legacies and find a path forward for everyone in the Pack. Stiles renews his quest for inner balance, to prevent his demons from overtaking him.

entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 356,356Chapters: 31/40Kudos: 881

Summary: “Have you ever heard of the butterfly effect?”He looked up and shook his head. “No… what is it?”“It’s the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it’s wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.”He nodded, that’s exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place… then none of this would be happening.But fuck it, ‘caution’ isn’t in his vocabulary.~~~UPDATES BIWEEKLY <3

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,023Chapters: 5/19Kudos: 151

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,216Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: No one is safe in the shadows—especially when the shadows remember.The world that remains is a graveyard with golden gates, ruled by the Argents, whose empire was built not on glory, but on silence, ash, and the bones of those who dared to dream. Derek Hale leads what’s left of the rebellion, his hands calloused by grief, his heart stitched together by war. He knows how power corrupts. He knows how mercy dies.But nothing has prepared him for the ghost wearing a human face.Stiles Stilinski.A name with no roots. A smile with too many meanings.He moves like a rumor — seen only when he chooses to be,his voice a blade wrapped in velvet,his eyes a storm no one can read.He speaks in riddles. He disappears like breath in winter.And he carries something ancient — something the world tried to forget.Derek doesn’t know if Stiles is a prophecy in disguise,or a ruin waiting to bloom.But as secrets surface like corpses beneath still water,a cruel truth rises with them:The crown may be made of iron,but it is the whisper at your side that will cut deepest.

entry.title: from the rooftops
entry.summary:
Author: sterek24 (mooncry89)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,408Chapters: 4/17Kudos: 170

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Now, several years later, he's back and he's bringing a few familiar faces with him. The Nemeton has been visiting Stiles's dreams, telling him he needs to come home - so that's what he's going to do. Oh, and he's going to rebuild the Hale Pack, too, no matter what True Alpha Scott McCall thinks about that.

entry.title: Alpha's Power
entry.summary:
Author: Aetherial_Book_God

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,214Chapters: 28/30Kudos: 171

Summary: Being Alpha meant Derek had to be the strongest, he had to be strong enough to keep the pack alive. He had to be the one whom the pack looked to for answers, so why was it so hard to say no to the temptation all around him? Particularly food and a certain ADHD human male who seemed to always be there when Derek needed him the most. As Derek's walls begin to crumble Stiles is right there at his side, encouraging him to relax, but Derek can't. He couldn't let down another family, he couldn't have what happened to his family happen to this pack. But what was so bad about letting go every once in a while?

entry.summary:
Author: our_sin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,592Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 1,081

Summary: “You know for how many times you’ve had to deal with this recently, you would think you would know that running never gets you anywhere. Scott gave you the bite, you- you aren’t supposed to be here.”   “You cannot get rid of something you were born with.”Or: Void's back but he seems less violent, less dangerous. entry.title: Who’s That Hot Guy in My Hospital Room?
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 697Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 147

Summary: Stiles wakes up groggy, sore, and drugged out of his mind after surgery. When a ruggedly handsome guy with stubble, muscles, and eyes like a storm walks into the hospital room, Stiles thinks he’s died and gone to heaven. He’s pretty sure this dude is the sexiest man he’s ever seen. So obviously, he starts flirting like his life depends on it. What he doesn’t realize is that he’s hitting on his husband. Derek. The man who’s been sleeping upright in a plastic chair for the past 17 hours and hasn’t stopped worrying since Stiles was wheeled into the OR.

entry.title: from flesh and bone
entry.summary:
Author: seaweedwater

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 80,600Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 62

Summary: “Do you think psychopaths can fall in love?”Stiles blinks and slants his head, studying Derek's face, eyebrows drawing in a fraction as he considers his answer.“I think true love requires empathy, which people with antisocial personality disorders tend to lack. But to answer your question, yes. It may be their version of what they believe love is. If they’ve convinced themselves it’s true, it is.”Derek hums in response with a short bob of his head, holding Stiles’ gaze.“Is that what you’ve gleaned so far, if psychopaths can love?” Stiles asks him, his tone curious.Derek shrugs. “Some of it, yeah. It just seems like someone with so much passion would be capable of such a thing.”
